Package assignment01

Class CounterModel

java.lang.Object
assignment01.CounterModel
public class CounterModel extends Object
CounterModel would perform the data manipulation required by the application. It contains the data for the application and would communicate with both the view and the controller. It uses PropertyChangeSupport to notify listeners that data has changed.
Author:
Abundance Esim, Jaswinder Singh, Jingmei Li

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CounterModel()
    Constructor for CounterModel, it creates an instance of the PropertyChangeSupport class and passes it a reference to this class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
    This method registers a property change listener with the Property Change Support.
    void
    processInputs(javafx.scene.control.TextArea textInput)
    This method would be used to process and calculate the number of characters, lines, words and digits in the text input by the user into the text area.
    void
    removeChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
    This method removes a property change listener from the list of registered Property Change Listeners.
    void
    setNewValue(String propertyName, int oldValue, int newValue)
    This method would notify all Property Change Listeners that a certain bound property has changed from its old value to a new one.

  • Constructor Details

    • CounterModel

      public CounterModel()
      Constructor for CounterModel, it creates an instance of the PropertyChangeSupport class and passes it a reference to this class.

  • Method Details

    • addChangeListener

      public void addChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
      This method registers a property change listener with the Property Change Support.
      Parameters:
      listener - The Property Change Listener to be added.

    • removeChangeListener

      public void removeChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
      This method removes a property change listener from the list of registered Property Change Listeners.
      Parameters:
      listener - The Property Change Listener to be removed.

    • setNewValue

      public void setNewValue(String propertyName, int oldValue, int newValue)
      This method would notify all Property Change Listeners that a certain bound property has changed from its old value to a new one.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - The name of the property.
      oldValue - The old value of the property.
      newValue - The new value of the property.

    • processInputs

      public void processInputs(javafx.scene.control.TextArea textInput)
      This method would be used to process and calculate the number of characters, lines, words and digits in the text input by the user into the text area.
      Parameters:
      textInput - The text input in the text area.
